column1: Little Goat Diner////Stephanie Izzard's follow up to Girl and the Goat doesn't live up to the high expectations set across the street. Little Goat's focus is diner food
column2: with small twists to old standards. But the prices are way higher than a traditional diner and don't seem to be justified because they swap out kimchi for saurkraut on the ruben. A $12 burger that doesn't even include fries?
